channel.title: I need help making it so that other people cant ban me nor be demoted
channel.description: Can anyone help me with this?

item.title: I need help making it so that other people cant ban me nor be demoted
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

Thanks For(;
any Ideas on how to make someone of equal rights not be able to ban someone higher rights or of equal rights
and for my co owners not be able to demote me?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help making it so that other people cant ban me nor be demoted

item.title: I need help making it so that other people cant ban me nor be demoted
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerRights >= 2 ||

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“iceman”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
if(!victim.equalsIgnoreCase(“iceman”)) {
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has banned "+victim);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
}
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/cxz/Desktop/pimpscape beta/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
}
  }

}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: I need help making it so that other people cant ban me nor be demoted
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

I have this:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerRights >= 2 ||

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“iceman”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has banned "+victim);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/cxz/Desktop/pimpscape beta/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

But I can still be banned… wtf?
